mapper.select: SELECT s.id ,s.title ,s.content ,s.day_start as "dayStart" ,s.time_start as "timeStart" ,s.start as start ,s.day_end as "dayEnd" ,s.time_end as "timeEnd" ,s.end ,s.display ,s.color ,s.textcolor as "textColor" ,s.author ,TU.NAME FROM SCHEDULE S JOIN TB_USER TU ON S.AUTHOR = TU.SEQ WHERE S.ID = CAST(#{id} as INTEGER)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule ( title, content, start, "end", day_start, day_end, time_start, time_end, display, color, textColor, author ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{start}, #{end}, #{dayStart}, #{dayEnd}, #{timeStart}, #{timeEnd}, #{display}, #{color}, #{textColor}, #{author} )
